      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AccountCustomDataPermissionResolver

      Methods in com.stormpath.spring.security.provider that return AccountPermissionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountPermissionResolver StormpathAuthenticationProvider.getAccountPermissionResolver()
      Returns the AccountPermissionResolver used to discover a Stormpath Account's directly-assigned permissions.
      Methods in com.stormpath.spring.security.provider with parameters of type AccountPermissionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StormpathAuthenticationProvider.setAccountPermissionResolver(AccountPermissionResolver accountPermissionResolver)
      Sets the AccountPermissionResolver used to discover a Stormpath Account's assigned permissions.
